website_summaries.verdict: An attractive and inexpensive bamboo knife block with a total of 19 slots.
pros: The wooden bamboo block's 19 spots can fit 8 steak knives, a cleaver, and kitchen shears, and more
Heavy weight to it so it won't slide around the countertop
Knives fit nicely inside and the block is extremely durable
cons: Some slots are not designed for any specific type of knives

customer_reviews.title: Not solid bamboo
customer_reviews.text: 1. It's not solid bamboo. It's bamboo that's glued onto some cheap pine. 2. The glue that's been used stinks. It makes the knives stink. I don't know that it's food safe. 3. The slots aren't milled very well. There are cheap pine splinters in the slots. Overall not satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: J. Chuang

customer_reviews.title: NOT PURELY MADE OF BAMBOO! MISLEADING!
customer_reviews.text: This is NOT made purely of bamboo, they should name this WRAPED WITH BAMBOO! I was hoping for a solid made or all the materials used is made solely of bamboo! This has covering of bamboo but inside is a cheap wood bark. Returning it!
customer_reviews.author: Eidderf

customer_reviews.title: Great Knife Block, good looking too!
customer_reviews.text: I've had a beautiful set of stainless steel knives stuck in a drawer because could not find a block to display them. The knives did not fit in the old block I had and in this block solved the problem. The contrast of the wood color and the stainless steel looks beautiful. Really pleased with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Marla

customer_reviews.title: Beware, long knife blades may extend beyond the bottom of this block
customer_reviews.text: My old storage block finally bit the dust and this one has come to the rescue. I like it much better than the old one because now I can also store my steak knives in the block. One problem is that my chef's knife and my bread knife stick out of the bottom of the block by about a quarter of an inch. The blades on these knives are 10 1/4" (to the handle where they sit on the block). It's fine for me, due to the way I have my block placed, but could be a problem for others, maybe? Excellent price. I'm happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: zaziesmom

customer_reviews.title: Lots of knife slots, crappy  laminate wrap
customer_reviews.text: I like this block because it has lots of slots for different size knives. BUT, the 1st terrace is only a cheap plastic laminate which came peeling and w which will probably look crappy in no time. I guess you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Randi k

customer_reviews.title: Soft pine interior, bamboo veneer
customer_reviews.text: It looks fine and is at a great price point, but be aware that this unit is soft pine interior with only about a quarter inch of bamboo veneer covering it, so longevity is unknown. Also the four slots at the bottom of the upper deck are not all that wide, so survey your knives carefully to make sure they will fit. Length of slots seems adequate, though.
customer_reviews.author: Speak to Deek

customer_reviews.title: Açaí Block - Sturdy & holds lots!
customer_reviews.text: This knife block is heavy and sturdy. Looks beautiful! Compared to my old KitchenAid knife block (see pic). this is much larger mainly bc it holds more but added height makes it looks more attractive too. Have had it for a few months now and no issues with peeling, cracking or fading. If you have the DalStrong steak knives, they will not fit in the lower steak knife slots. It was my fault for not checking first but there’s enough slots to place them elsewhere. One issue for me is that the scissors do not sit well but slanted and cramped between the other knives. Not a deal breaker; just an aesthetic issue. Overall, happy with my upgraded knife block!
customer_reviews.author: Iris

customer_reviews.title: TERMITES!
customer_reviews.text: I am freaking out! I opened the knife block yesterday and put it on my kitchen counter. When I awoke this morning, there were TERMITES surrounding the block! Do not buy this product!!!
customer_reviews.author: G.E.

customer_reviews.title: Works great for us!!
customer_reviews.text: We just replaced our 6 steak knives with a set of 8 with 5 inch blades and needed a new knife block. We researched many others and even purchased one that we thought would work but found, to our disappointment, that the steak knife blades in the bottom row were sticking out the bottom of the block. We replaced it with the Cook N Home Bamboo block and it's so much better!! All our knives fit perfectly including the 8 new steak knives, and it looks great on our quartz countertop!! I would recommend this knife block for anyone with a similar circumstance.
customer_reviews.author: traveler47NJ

customer_reviews.title: Love this block
customer_reviews.text: I recently started using a cleaver type knife which is just over 3" wide. This knife block accommodates it perfectly, as well as all my other knives. Bamboo always holds up incredibly and I like that the knife slots are cut out of the bamboo. My old knife block was not cut out and it fell apart. I also like that there are the 8 steak knife slots because I can keep my smaller knives there. Well worth the money. 5 stars!
customer_reviews.author: Nitty's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Plenty of slots for knives, shears, and sharpening steel--My wife loves it!
customer_reviews.text: We moved into a new house recently and threw away the old grease covered knife block we had. We don't have enough drawer space to put knives there, plus jostling around in the drawer tends to dull them. This block was just the ticket for holding large butcher knives, chef's knives, bread knives, steak knives, kitchen shears, and a sharpening steel.
customer_reviews.author: Old Geezer

customer_reviews.title: Well crafted
customer_reviews.text: The Cook N Home nice knife block. Very sturdy and beautifully crafted. Unfortunately, I had to return. It was too large for the space I have. I already have one of the larger size that came with my old knives. My new set of knives is small so I needed a smaller knife holder that would fit in the space I have.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: FIts all of my knives
customer_reviews.text: I was specifically looking for a knife block that would hold our cleaver since I wanted to get it out of our kitchen drawer. This fits perfectly and has more than enough space for all of our large knives. My only minor complaint is there isn't a smaller slot on the top section for pairing knives. Ours fits in there but it wiggles around a lot. Overall very satisfied and we'll see how it holds up.
customer_reviews.author: Reggie_0384

customer_reviews.title: One large slot blocked
customer_reviews.text: I kept this block but eventually discovered that one of the large slots was blocked so I couldn't put big knives in it. So I just ordered a 20-slot block and am giving away this one. Make sure and check all slots when you get it. Obviously, if you have carpenter tools, you could clear it out but I don't have the proper saw or whatever to do that.
customer_reviews.author: Lynne Terry

customer_reviews.title: Must have knife block
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this knife block! Just got a set of extra sharp Vertoku knives and they fit so well. The knife block is so well constructed and looks great! Not too big or small. High quality for a great price! Plenty of nice sized slots for all kinds of knives. Great deal for a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Savvy Internet Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Good price.  Beats paying $50 at a Kitchen/ Bath shop
customer_reviews.text: Room for a cleaver and kitchen shears. it is pine wood covered with a Bamboo layer for a nice look. I am wishing they would change the angle of the base to make it easier to draw out the longest blades with out my hand hitting the upper cabinet/ That said, it is the same as the more expensive ones.
customer_reviews.author: ed romi

customer_reviews.title: Heavy and steady
customer_reviews.text: This knife block has the weight I was looking for. I have never tipped it trying to get a knife out. I also use it to hold my cutting boards against the wall on the counter and it is still very sturdy. There are plenty of slots for knives, but it could use one more slot for the 2 inch knives as I do not use many 1.5 inch knives. My bread knife slides all the way down to the handle.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 30 Bucks--19 Slots--Fits All My Cutting/Slicing/Peeling Tools
customer_reviews.text: Good knife block for the price if you don't mind the following two things. 1. The blades go into the block horizontally. My old block was vertical so this was a bit of an adjustment for me 2. It's a 1/4" bamboo veneer on top of a soft wood block. So it only looks bamboo. It's not 100% bamboo all the way through That said, I'm excited that my cleaver fits. My fruit/vegetable peeler also fits into the sharpening iron slot. 30 bucks. 19 slots. Fits all my cutting/slicing/peeling tools. YES!!!
customer_reviews.author: MemlyTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Excellent and NO need to buy any other more expensive block
customer_reviews.text: I had to write this in response to some other reviews that almost scared me needlessly to purchase a a more expensive knife block as $18 seemed to cheap a price for anything of quality. This is a great quality knife block made of compressed 1/4 inch laminated slices like all bamboo products which forms a solid block of bamboo. There is no laminate that can peal off. The block is big, heavy and looks great. It fits all standard knife sets and scissors and should hold up. Do not be scared off by the price. Unless you only want solid wood blocks, no one will criticize this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Golden Roberts

customer_reviews.title: And it looks good to boot
customer_reviews.text: Lost my last butchers block ina an apartment fire but still had all my wusthoff cutlery, as well as a few specialty knives. AS I've been reorganizing my rebuilt apartment, I decided I needed another block to free up drawer space. This block holds nearly all of my combined cutlery in a compact footprint (several chefs knives, deboners, service knives, general purpose knives, pairing knives, diamond sharpener all fit in easily).. And it looks good to boot!
customer_reviews.author: Mad Gremlin

customer_reviews.title: Not what it seems.
customer_reviews.text: This knife block should be advertised as bamboo veneered, not bamboo. There are only two slots wide enough for a chef's knife or santuko.
customer_reviews.author: AndrewWN

customer_reviews.title: Great value for an excellent product!
customer_reviews.text: While this may not be the fanciest, or highest grade materials, you will have a very hard time finding a better value. We replaced one of those plastic-rod style knife holders with this, and it's been an excellent upgrade. This block has plenty of different sizes to allow most of your common knives and tools to fit. It's very sturdy and looks great on the countertop. I do wish there were a few more slots, but at the price point, this is an incredible value and has held up perfectly in our house over the last 10 months.
customer_reviews.author: Jon & Vanessa W

customer_reviews.title: A Slot for Everything!
customer_reviews.text: There are so many different slots on this that I can find a place for all of my knives. I even put my kitchen shears in one of the holes. Does its job in a very stylish way, and I love having the steak knives out, too.
customer_reviews.author: E. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Looks Good and Pretty Functional
customer_reviews.text: Plenty of slots for most kinds of knives, but the two cleavers I own are both too thick to fit into the too-skinny cleaver slot. The top slots will take a fairly long knives and the steel and scissors slots are great.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Warren

customer_reviews.title: Looks Great, Works Well - Great Product.
customer_reviews.text: I love it. It works for my knives. It is 100% bamboo unlike what other reviewers have said. I like that it is open at the bottom so that anything that falls in the slots keeps falling through. No chance for food or other materials to build up in the knife block. The weight of the block holds it in place. No chance of knocking it over when pulling out a knife. My only suggestion to the manufacturer would be to change the position of the knives to vertical instead or horizontal. Otherwise it looks great and it keeps your knives safe and secure. It holds 18 knives and a knife steel. That is a lot of knives. Great Product!
customer_reviews.author: Ron C

customer_reviews.title: Great Knife Block for the Price!
customer_reviews.text: This knife block is exactly what I was hoping for. The color resembles my kitchen cabinets very closely, the slots fit all our knives and scissors fairly well. The scissors are a little cramped in between the two lowest knife slots, but that could easily be remedied by finding a less bulky pair of kitchen scissors - which I may do later on down the line. The block is heavy enough that it doesn't move easily across the counter when I'm retrieving a knife from it, and it didn't have a bad smell right out of the box (which some others do). Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Maribug971Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful knife block! Too bad the steak knife slots aren't bigger
customer_reviews.text: I bought this knife block because I needed a home for my Sky Light steak knives. (BTW...knives are the best item I ever bough here!) The Sky Light knives have a one inch blade. This knife block has 8 steak/paring knife slots but they are 3/4 inch. I missed this detail in the Answered Questions. It's a great block. Too bad they didn't design it with 6 wider slots rather than the 8 three quarter inch slots. I'll be returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Jim G

customer_reviews.title: So far so good, great value.
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. This block has worked well for me, it isn't perfect but it is a good fit for most knives. My wife and I married recently and have a mismatched collection of knives that we have picked up over the years. We are looking for a new set of cutlery but decided to use our current knives until we decide. This block has allowed us to do so in a neat and orderly fashion. Our knives fit, but not perfectly. That isn't a gripe on the product but it is to be expected with a block meant to accommodate a wide variety of knives.
customer_reviews.author: shakeandbake72

customer_reviews.title: Broke in months
customer_reviews.text: Front of block broke off within first 6 months of use, which was pretty disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon D

customer_reviews.title: Well-constructed block
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful product!!! I like the finish/construction of this block so much more than one I had previously ordered (and returned). I wish my cleaver fit in it, but the rest of my knife collection fits and that's enough for me to be thrilled with this product. If a new version ever comes out, it would be nice to find one that fits most meat cleavers.Overall it's a beautiful, well made-block and looks great on my countertop!
customer_reviews.author: Evelyn K Soto

customer_reviews.title: Large (long) footprint. 10" knives it won't fit in the main chef knife slots.
customer_reviews.text: I realize that most people use 8" knives in their kitchen at home, but if you use a 10" blade, it won't fit in the main two knife sections, and instead I have to put it in the really wide slot on the top that I assume is for a cleaver of some sort. The block also has a long foot print. If I put it up against the backsplash on the counter, and then put my main cutting board up against the block, the cutting board hangs off the counter by an inch. I live in a small apartment and counter space is limited, so this is another annoyance.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: I love it! This is the best I ever had. You can insert different sets of knives. No need to throw old undamaged knives away. The spot in the front is to hold kitchen scissors. It's sturdy. It looks amazing on my counter top!
customer_reviews.author: She

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and that is what you get
customer_reviews.text: Wife wanted cheap knife storage block and we got it. It is cheap. Hope it doesn't break- The finishings are crude and we pray that the wood won't rot. You get what you pay for- It does hold the knives so three stars!
customer_reviews.author: P. Kim

customer_reviews.title: Convenient having deep, large slots fitting most professional and non professional cutlery
customer_reviews.text: Works for me. As a chef, the need to have various sized knives at your fingertips is essential. A bit large for the average kitchen counter, but excellent in a professional kitchen and can't beat the price.
customer_reviews.author: Carl S U

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality, warmer color than pictured which I loved. Didn't expect that my previous set was only a set of 6 steak knives which is ok as I wanted to replace them with a non-serrated set regardless.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Dubois

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and Functional
customer_reviews.text: The Acacia wood block is beautiful and has enough slots to hold all of our knives nicely. The larger hole I think is usually for kitchen shears, but works well for our carving fork.
customer_reviews.author: Zara

customer_reviews.title: Many slots for all your sharp knives!
customer_reviews.text: This looks great and matches the lids on my canisters (acacia). I switched out the knife block I had for this and I'm so glad I did. It not only looks great but it is made well!
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Archer

customer_reviews.title: core appears pine, not solid bamboo, adequate for the price.
customer_reviews.text: It looks like it's not solid bamboo, the bottom clearly shows the core as pine. there are two xlarge size blade slots, there could be 3 or 4, instead of 2 large slots, otherwise it suits my needs, for the price. My large professional chopping knife doesn't fit all the way down and only fits in the top XXL slot, which is fine, it's professional grade, this block is not, so, adequate for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Hole for kitchen sheers perfect size. Knives fit nicely. I even put my pizza slicer in the long hole. It fits as long as the pizza slicer leans on wall
customer_reviews.author: alhal22

customer_reviews.title: it holds knives.
customer_reviews.text: Overall I'm pleased with this purchase. It accommodates my knives, cleaver, and steel nicely.... However the scissor slot should have been cut out vertically instead of horizontally... Scissor handles get tangled up in the knife handles.
customer_reviews.author: Robert J

customer_reviews.title: Great block
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to update my old worn out block. Happy with the slots, fits everything with room to add a couple knives, sits well on the counter. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: DebinUt

customer_reviews.title: Great aesthetics, but the knife slots aren't very standard.
customer_reviews.text: This bamboo knife block is beautiful out of the box and complements my kitchen well. It is a bit deeper than you might expect, so if you don't have deep counters, I'd go for a smaller block. Pros: lots of steak knife/dinner knife holders, the top right slot holds a cleaver well, and construction is good. Cons: the 2nd, 3rd, and 4th slots on the right and the 4th slot on the left don't seem to be tailored toward any particular knife design. They're a bit big for a vegetable, bread, or paring knife, but too small for a 4" santoku or 6" chef knife.
customer_reviews.author: Allan Gao

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought this knife block to get better organized because I had so many extra knives in my drawer. I love it as there are various size holes in it and some of the holes are large enough that you can put two knives side by side in the slot. I have all my extra knives in it and now I can find them easily at a glance instead of looking for them in a drawer. so glad I bought this.
customer_reviews.author: Julene Pfister

customer_reviews.title: The price was right, but....
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking piece, with the number of knife slits I need. Very functional, and exceptionally affordable. However layout accuracy leaves a lot to be desired with uneven spacing and slot thickness. If you are a stickler for accuracy or how the knives will look when racked in the block, this might not be a good choice.
customer_reviews.author: Neumba

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, great price, universal fit
customer_reviews.text: I have a set of Chicago Cutlery Insignia knives that I purchased with no block and this one fit the entire set perfectly! This particular set has very wide handles and the steak knives fit in the bottom portion of the block as they should. The color of the block is beautiful, superb quality, and fast shipping. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: ZebraServedFresh

customer_reviews.title: fits all the knives I have
customer_reviews.text: I have 3 different blocks now all lined up on the counter with ALL my knives out there...so none stashed in drawers somewhere...
customer_reviews.author: adrian crutch

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful. Very heavy. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome knife block. Lots of knife slots, I needed every one of them. No more sharp knives in the drawers. Heavy. No danger of it getting scooted around on the counter. I do wish my pizza cutter fit tho.
customer_reviews.author: Sam54

customer_reviews.title: IT HOLDS KNIVES!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: It does. Really well. It is easy to assemble, no batteries or strangely configured power cords. This is one block of wood that does what it promises and not one thing more.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Wagner

customer_reviews.title: Really nice Acacia wood knife block!
customer_reviews.text: Solid, nicely finished and affordable--I couldn't be happier! Had a problem with the first one received, but the seller replaced it right away. Thumbs up!
customer_reviews.author: Pete J

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Cheapest one I could find and worth it. It’s a knife block. Doesn’t have yo do more than hold a knife safely which it succeeds in doing. Plenty of space to hold my expensive knives. Glad to save a few bucks here and get the better knives I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Joanne M.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Knife Block - Great Price
customer_reviews.text: This knife block was reduced in price. We lucked up on getting it, and are very happy using it. We have been able to find easy-access homes for many of our steak knives, large knives that have no sheaths. Excellent purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Tumlin

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME KNIFE BLOCK!!
customer_reviews.text: I had 2 older butcher block storage units. I ordered this to combine all my NEW & older knives to fit into one block. It WORKED very nice!!! All the knives I need in one block storage unit. AWESOME!! By combining everything, I added more counter space!! LOVE IT!!
customer_reviews.author: D. Parks

customer_reviews.title: A great value
customer_reviews.text: Really glad I bought this - it fits all my knives and looks good on the counter. Doesn't take up a lot of room, either.
customer_reviews.author: ldl

customer_reviews.title: Fits nicely
customer_reviews.text: This block is perfect for my small kitchen. Gets my knives out of the drawer, holds all 8 steak knives as well as my prep knives, fits nicely under cabinets, and keeps my cutting boards standing against the side. Wish one of the narrower slots were slightly wider. I have one knife that won’t quite sit down in.
customer_reviews.author: Silas Family

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy and pleasing to look at.
customer_reviews.text: I love my knife holder! I wish it didn’t take up so much space on the counter, but it is very handsome and keeps my knives stored very nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Tokuji E.

customer_reviews.title: Nice, larger block
customer_reviews.text: Holds a wide range of knives and also is convenient for 1 pair of scissors. Heavy and well made.
customer_reviews.author: always curious

customer_reviews.title: Good value!
customer_reviews.text: Our old knife set was in perfect condition but the old block was tired. This one looks nice and clean and new again
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Paul R. Rouillard

customer_reviews.title: Nice knife block
customer_reviews.text: Great looking, arrived nicely packaged and lots of room for all of our knives. Opening for the kitchen sheers DOES NOT block access to the knives as another reviewer reported. Maybe they had different kinds of knives?? I would definitely recommend and would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Great knife block, small life slots
customer_reviews.text: It’s a good knife block. My only issue are the sizes of the block. I’m a Chef and bought this block for my house. The slot sizes are very slim and don’t not fit/hold most of my knives, on the the thinner smaller French knives(Asian style), pairing, Boning, and steak knives. Other than that, looks nice and is built very well! Just check the sizes of your knives first!
customer_reviews.author: Joe Rubino

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and functional!
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this wood block! Our knives fit in very well. Better than expected!!
customer_reviews.author: Smiller

customer_reviews.title: Very good knife block with lots of slots
customer_reviews.text: Solid piece with lots of slots and a nice dark stain. This gives me plenty of spots of my knives.
customer_reviews.author: I. Henry

customer_reviews.title: Solid and Practical
customer_reviews.text: Good deal for the money. The block is solid and has enough slots to hold a variety of knives.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good design and well constructed
customer_reviews.text: This knife block was just what I needed. I like how it doesn’t limit the number of larger knife slots. It very versatile. I like that it is made from bamboo. Looks great!
customer_reviews.author: Bradley W. Diehl

customer_reviews.title: All my knives in one place
customer_reviews.text: I hate buying new things for my home. Therefore, the old nasty knife block I had for years went unreplaced. Finally gave in and got this block. Love it. Everything fits, including my scissors and it looks great on my counter.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT- great price!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is small but perfect for our kitchen. We have another knife block but its really nice for all the knives we use on a daily basis. It holds almost every size.
customer_reviews.author: Grace Keiser

customer_reviews.title: Stores small knives
customer_reviews.text: The bamboo knife block is very well made and very attractive. It is the most attractive block in my kitchen. However, I purchased the block to store a new 6 piece kitchen knife set and only 4 of the 6 knives have slots wide enough to be housed in the block. It is fine for narrow carving knives, bread knives, fillet knives or paring knives. The space between vertical slots if very generous providing adequate space for the knife handles. This would be a 5 star knife block if some of the slots were wider.
customer_reviews.author: W. Stevens

customer_reviews.title: NY their 3 years old son is now reaching the kitchen counter and opening drawers with this knife storage it looks good and secured at the rear of the stove
customer_reviews.text: Give this to my daughter and her husband they just bought a new house in Mt. Kisco, NY their 3 years old son is now reaching the kitchen counter and opening drawers with this knife storage it looks good and secured at the rear of the stove.
customer_reviews.author: A. Mescallado

customer_reviews.title: Great kitchen addition
customer_reviews.text: It was a gift, product was as promised new and well constructed! Good item and valuec
customer_reviews.author: Ron Lafontaine

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and look
customer_reviews.text: I love how this holds all of my knives from long to short and they are being stored safely.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good block
customer_reviews.text: Holds everything we have, almost. The space for the steel holds our old "steel" steel but it's to small for our larger diameter ceramic hone.Has the depth for everything else.
customer_reviews.author: D. McCarthy

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Gave this 4 stars because not all of the slots fit the knives I have. But other than that it’s a great knife block for the price. Looks nice on the kitchen counter.
customer_reviews.author: Brittani Buchanan

customer_reviews.title: This Baby Holds A Lot !!
customer_reviews.text: I own a lot of knives and my old block could not hold them all. This one is great. I especially like that it holds 8 small paring type knives. Finally, all my knives in one place!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Marshall Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Organized and handy
customer_reviews.text: I had so many knifes in drawer that I could never find now there they are so organized
customer_reviews.author: darlene

customer_reviews.title: Very nice block, here’s how you maintain it.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice storage block. But, a tip for maintaining these blocks, or care for your knives in general, it maybe a no brainer, but make sure to dry your knives before you store them in the blocks, otherwise mold will grow in the slots, and you can only imagine that...
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: Egh
customer_reviews.text: It took forever to get here. The bottom slots font line up. So the steak knives don’t go fully into the slot. Overall not the greatest but it’s decent enough.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Ramos

customer_reviews.title: Great addition
customer_reviews.text: Looks great in my kitchen and holds all of the loose knives I had in my drawers! Love it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: correct knife storage
customer_reviews.text: The wood is top quality and the slots to hold the knifes are placed correctly in a horizontal direction to keep from dulling the blades
customer_reviews.author: NM Norma

customer_reviews.title: Good knife block for the value
customer_reviews.text: Excellent knife block for the value. Holds all our knives well, seems sturdy, does not knock over easy. Is heavy, but that is preferred in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: The Junglee One

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as pictured
customer_reviews.text: I have a lot of kitchen knives collected over the years and needed a safer place to store them. This block works well for that and it is exactly as pictured. One surprise for me is that the block is open at the bottom. While this is good to prevent dust build-up I do have to store a long bread knife in one of the large, upper slots because it hit the counter in the thinner slots.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda S.

customer_reviews.title: Decent Quality
customer_reviews.text: Decent block for the price. One of the internal divider blocks was loose and prevent the knife from sliding into the slot easy. Could have returned it but i just dripped some glue inside the block and laid it on its side until it dried in place. The block will do the job for now. With that being said the outside of the block is very good condition, tight bamboo with no gaps and smooth finish.
customer_reviews.author: J. Vorhees

customer_reviews.title: Love all the room for my knives
customer_reviews.text: Love that I am able to put all my knives in the block!!
customer_reviews.author: kc2001

customer_reviews.title: Nice piece
customer_reviews.text: Nice wood ,,but the way organized ro insert yhe knives not really the way i thought .
customer_reviews.author: ADNAN A.

customer_reviews.title: Nifty knife block
customer_reviews.text: This block is pretty handy. It has many different size slots for all sorts of knife shapes. All of the slots go down to the bottom of the block so no worrying about knives sticking out. My bread knives fit in all the way. The little slots work well for paring or steak knives. It even has wide slots for chopping knives. You should have no problems out of this block as far as function. You may run out of space depending on quantity and or type of knives you have. It only has a few slots for specialty knives.
customer_reviews.author: BargainHunter

customer_reviews.title: Very happy!
customer_reviews.text: Nicely packaged and fit knives very easy. Beautiful knife block.
customer_reviews.author: Beautyandthebruno

customer_reviews.title: Happy with purchase
customer_reviews.text: Very nice wood block.. great quality for a great price
customer_reviews.author: RAM POWER

customer_reviews.title: Handy in the kitchen
customer_reviews.text: Fits all the knifes I have Check which knifes you need it fore
customer_reviews.author: Anna De Ranieri

customer_reviews.title: Knife and  Scissor  holder
customer_reviews.text: I got tired of digging in the drawer to find a knife So I looked on line to Amazon to see what they have to organize the knifes and found this. It does what it was designed to do and now I can't cut myself to find a certain knife.
customer_reviews.author: John Willem

customer_reviews.title: The quality seems good for the price
customer_reviews.text: The quality seems good for the price, but to improve I would have liked another slot for a large cutting knife (chef's or cook's knife size, not the super big meat clever size). There are only two slots (upper left ish) for the chef's/cook's knife size, and the rest are relatively small. Just personal preference maybe, but there is more than ample space for smaller knives to say the least.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Sutherland

customer_reviews.title: Great good looking
customer_reviews.text: I like it a lot looks great hold the knives on there side to prevent edge wear
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Great Block for the Money
customer_reviews.text: Very nice knife storage block. Appears nicely made and finish is attractive. This has a thick bamboo veneer over a generic wood core. Looks good on the counter top. PS-If you are looking for a solid hard wood block, this is not it...you are going to need to pay $40+ for that.
customer_reviews.author: PhiLo

customer_reviews.title: Great looking product
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, love it, best thing we have bought for the kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Lester Honeycutt

customer_reviews.title: Great and versatle knife block.
customer_reviews.text: Love this knife block. We recently purchased all new knives, none of which came with a block. This holds all of them perfectly and is very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: JW

customer_reviews.title: Same space as our smaller one
customer_reviews.text: Holds all of my good knives. I wanted one for our new ceramic knives
customer_reviews.author: Mary Agnes Riggle

customer_reviews.title: Holds lots of knives.
customer_reviews.text: Good solid quality. It holds everything I have. I don't have a cleaver but you might want to make sure yours would fit in the space provided. I could see fashioning a magnet to either side or the back if your cleaver is too wide or thick. The fact that I don't have to shovel around in a drawer for steak knives anymore is great.
customer_reviews.author: James L. Caulfield

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for all of my knives, keeping them out of drawers!
customer_reviews.text: Took all of my knives out of various drawers and put them into thius wonderful knife block!
customer_reviews.author: Delores DeHamer

customer_reviews.title: Bamboo knife block
customer_reviews.text: This knife block is great. There are enough holes of various sizes that all of my Cutco knives that I've bought over the years fit easily - we've been putting two in the long cleaver slot because it's huge. It's an attractive bamboo and it is heavy enough to not knock over when you grab for a knife. Even though there are twice the holes of the previous knife block we had, it is not that much bigger on the counter.
customer_reviews.author: Alyx

customer_reviews.title: Serves its purpose.
customer_reviews.text: Serves its purpose and seems to be made out of a very strong material (bamboo). I bit expensive IMHO, but still the best value of those offered on Amazon. Could do without the logo.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Nicely made. Great price.
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, sturdy, nicely made and the price was right. I was able to fit my 21 piece knife set in this.
customer_reviews.author: Jan Byrne

customer_reviews.title: That was a disappointment. I do like having a slot for a ...
customer_reviews.text: Attractive and functional. More slots than my old block so I can get most of my knives in it. Unfortunately the location of the hole for kitchen shears (on the lower row of the main block) doesn't work with my shears. The handles are too wide and interfere with the nearby slots. That was a disappointment. I do like having a slot for a cleaver. All in all a good item.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi M.

customer_reviews.title: A good deal
customer_reviews.text: I don't know what you can say about a knife block really, but this one is attractive and has slots that fit all my knives. I recently got a set of Japanese Damascus knives and the chef's knife has a wider blade than my old one so I needed a block with at least one wide slot and my knife fits great in the widest one. I'm satisfied with the build quality, it holds more knives and takes up a little less space than the Henkles I was using.
customer_reviews.author: James A. Haler

product_meta.title: Cook N Home NC-00326 Bamboo Knife Storage Block, 19 SLOT
product_meta.description: Style Name:Bamboo slotsThe Cook N Home Bamboo knife storage block, 19 Slot is made of natural Bamboo that is durable and looks great. Holds most commonly used knives and accessories up to 9 inches deep. 19 Slot widths range from 3/4 to 3 1/4 inches and holds chef’s, steak, wide and long knives, and a cleaver. Wider slots can hold a kitchen scissor, sharpening steel, and other items. Angled slot to grab knives easily. Rubber feet prevents block from slipping. Dimensions are 10. 2 in. Length, 9. 2 in. Height, and 4. 8 in. Width. Wipe with cloth to clean.
feature_bullets: Made of natural Bamboo with 19 slots that is durable and looks great
Holds most commonly used knives and accessories up to 9 inches deep
Variety of widths hold chef’s, steak, wide and long knives, and a cleaver.Stain Resistant
Wider slots can hold a kitchen scissor, sharpening steel, and other items
Dimensions: 10. 2” length, 9. 2” Height, 4. 8” width. Wipe with cloth to clean.
